item.title: [194] -Lithium Server Base Created From Nothing But Simple Rendering- [194]
item.dc:creator: @Daginith Daginith
item.description:
@Daginith wrote:

[quote=“ox random xi, post:97, topic:435428”][quote author=Daginith link=topic=538148.msg3969108#msg3969108 date=1334003802]

I keep trying to find a 194 source and client, can’t come up with anything right now…

If you really want it, i can look at my old archives. But i had deleted it a while back.

You can ask Iamsuperman05 (He did alot on this too)

or look up Osirus.
[/quote]
Yeah I’m trying to get Osirus to work.
I’ve also found out that no 194 actually exist because of the maps not being in the cache and the lowest revision is like high 200s that load maps from cache.[/quote]
To be completely honest this server was a [modded] 317 client loading mainly 194 maps/gfx/items/npc…etc and 317 for whatever was left over.
I have never seen a full “real” 194 server sadly.

Here is what i could find in my archives.(Server+Client)
I have no idea what version this is, and if it even runs.
http://www.upload.ee/files/2245784/Lithium-Source.tar.gz.html

To run it, import it into netbeans, then build and run.

Read full topic

If you really want it, i can look at my old archives. But i had deleted it a while back.

You can ask Iamsuperman05 (He did alot on this too)

or look up Osirus.[/quote]

I’ve also found out that no 194 actually exist because of the maps not being in the cache and the lowest revision is like high 200s that load maps from cache.

item.title: [194] -Lithium Server Base Created From Nothing But Simple Rendering- [194]
item.dc:creator: @Crown2 Crown2
item.description:
@Crown2 wrote:

[quote=“Daginith, post:81, topic:435428”][quote author=iz3 legend link=topic=538148.msg3937893#msg3937893 date=1331172599]
Here ill fix it.

“Made from nothing but, walking, talking, rendering, item support, and banking.”

Features include: walking, talking, rendering, item support and banking.
[/quote]

I deleted the whole damn topic. -.-

I Just wanted people that use nothing but PI or Delta to try something new. But obviously people cant handle change.[/quote]

ehh a bit to harsh dont let them get to you theres always going to be people that dont agree with you no matter what

Read full topic

item.title: [194] -Lithium Server Base Created From Nothing But Simple Rendering- [194]
item.dc:creator: @Kidpaparoach Kidpaparoach
item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

[quote=“TheHolyGrail, post:82, topic:435428”][quote author=Daginith link=topic=538148.msg3937898#msg3937898 date=1331172794]

Here ill fix it.

“Made from nothing but, walking, talking, rendering, item support, and banking.”

Features include: walking, talking, rendering, item support and banking.

I deleted the whole damn topic. -.-

I Just wanted people that use nothing but PI or Delta to try something new. But obviously people cant handle change.
[/quote]This is worse than, or just as bad as, a delta (no joke, this is pretty much winterlove with a 194 look-a-like client). This would not be a good change if people used this lol.[/quote]
Bit harsh man, if you don’t think its that good you could tell him a little less harshly cause him and other people have put hard work into it. I think Delta’s crap but I’d never tell anyone who worked on it(majorly) thats its crap(not saying that this one is bad as I don’t know). I’d say its not my thing and I think they could have done it better with the ability that they posses. But hey its up to you the way you speak ofc, just a lil bit more consideration never hurts.

Read full topic
